newsletter.title: Subscribe to Our Newsletter
newsletter.description: Get the latest updates, exclusive content, and insider tips delivered straight to your inbox.
newsletter.privacyNotice: We respect your privacy. Unsubscribe at any time.
settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure application settings and upload calendar files
settings.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the application
settings.calendarDescription: Upload a .ics file to display tithi and event information
settings.gujaratiTithiInfo: Events with Gujarati tithi information will be displayed
settings.uploadIcsDescription: Upload a .ics file to display tithi and event information
settings.additionalSettingsDescription: Additional settings will be available here in future updates.
meals.title: Meals
meals.fixIssuesToSeeCalculations: Please fix the following issues to see calculations:
meals.enterIngredientDetailsToSeeCalcula: Enter ingredient details to see calculations
meals.failedToAddMeal: Failed to add meal. Please check your inputs and try again.
meals.mealPlannedNotes: Meal planned for {mealType} with {servings} {unit} servings and {ghan} ghan factor.
meals.ghanPositive: Ghan must be a positive number
meals.servingAmountPositive: Serving amount must be a positive number
meals.quantityPositive: Quantity must be a positive number
meals.ingredientsRequired: At least one ingredient is required
reports.title: Reports
reports.generateReportsDescription: Create and download detailed reports with ingredient combinations for your kitchen operations
reports.pleaseSelectAtLeastOneReportType: Please select at least one report type
reports.pleaseSelectAtLeastOneKitchen: Please select at least one kitchen
reports.selectReportDateDescription: Select the date for which you want to generate reports. This will include all menu items and recipes scheduled for this specific date.
reports.chooseKitchensDescription: Choose which kitchens to include in your reports. You can select multiple kitchens to generate combined reports or individual reports for each kitchen.
reports.selectReportTypesDescription: Select which types of reports to generate. Each report type provides different insights and data for your kitchen operations.
reports.advancedOptionsDescription: Configure advanced report options for enhanced functionality and detailed analysis.
reports.combineMealTypesDescription: Aggregate ingredients from all selected meal types (breakfast, lunch, dinner) into a single report. This creates a comprehensive daily overview.
reports.aggregateIngredientsFromSelected: Aggregate ingredients from selected meal types
reports.combineKitchensDescription: Merge data from all selected kitchens into unified reports. Useful for multi-kitchen operations and centralized planning.
reports.aggregateIngredientsFromAllSelec: Aggregate ingredients from all selected kitchens
reports.generateBothVersionsDescription: Create both combined and individual reports. This gives you both detailed breakdowns and consolidated views for maximum flexibility.
reports.createBothCombinedAndSeparateRep: Create both combined and separate reports
reports.attachRecipePrintsDescription: Include detailed recipe pages with instructions, ingredients, and cooking methods. Each unique recipe appears only once, even if used multiple times.
reports.includeDetailedRecipePagesForAll: Include detailed recipe pages for all used recipes
reports.includeNutritionalInfoDescriptio: Add nutritional information including calories, protein, carbohydrates, fats, and other dietary details for each recipe and meal.
reports.includeCaloriesProteinCarbsAndOt: Include calories, protein, carbs, and other nutrients
reports.includeCostAnalysisDescription: Add detailed cost breakdowns including ingredient costs, total meal costs, cost per serving, and budget analysis for financial planning.
reports.includeIngredientCostsAndBudgetA: Include ingredient costs and budget analysis
reports.chooseFileFormatDescription: Choose the file format for your reports. Each format has different advantages for viewing, editing, and sharing your data.
reports.breakfastReportDescription: Menu items and ingredients for breakfast
reports.breakfastReportDetailedDescripti: Detailed breakdown of breakfast menu items, including individual recipes, ingredient quantities, nutritional information, and preparation instructions. Perfect for kitchen staff and nutrition planning.
reports.lunchReportDescription: Menu items and ingredients for lunch
reports.lunchReportDetailedDescription: Comprehensive lunch menu analysis with recipe details, ingredient lists, portion sizes, and dietary information. Ideal for meal planning and cost analysis.
reports.dinnerReportDescription: Menu items and ingredients for dinner
reports.dinnerReportDetailedDescription: Complete dinner menu report featuring all recipes, ingredients, cooking methods, and serving sizes. Essential for inventory management and staff training.
reports.combinedIngredientsReportDescrip: Aggregated ingredients across selected meal types and kitchens
reports.combinedIngredientsReportDetaile: Master ingredient list combining all selected meal types and kitchens. Shows total quantities needed, cost analysis, and shopping lists. Perfect for bulk purchasing and inventory planning.
reports.executiveSummaryDescription: High-level overview with key metrics and insights
reports.executiveSummaryDetailedDescript: Executive-level report with key performance indicators, cost summaries, nutritional overviews, and operational insights. Perfect for management review and strategic planning.
reports.pdfDocumentDetailedDescription: Professional formatted document with tables, charts, and proper layout. Perfect for printing, sharing with management, or archiving records.
reports.excelSpreadsheetDetailedDescript: Interactive spreadsheet with formulas, filters, and pivot tables. Great for data analysis, cost calculations, and custom reporting.
reports.csvFileDetailedDescription: Simple comma-separated values format. Easy to import into other systems, databases, or analysis tools. Minimal formatting, maximum compatibility.
recipes.title: Recipes
recipes.name: Recipe Name
recipes.managementSubtitle: Create, manage, and organize your kitchen recipes
recipes.searchAndFilterDescription: Find and filter recipes by name, category, and subcategory
recipes.subcategoryRequired: Subcategory is required for a recipe.
recipes.ingredientsRequired: At least one ingredient is required.
recipes.printRecipeDescription: Preview, print, or download your recipe as a PDF document.
recipes.recipeInformationDescription: Enter the basic details for your recipe
recipes.recipeNamePlaceholder: Enter recipe name (e.g., Curry, Pasta Carbonara)
recipes.ingredientsDescription: Add ingredients with quantities and costs
recipes.instructionsDescription: Write step-by-step instructions. Use lists and formatting as needed.
recipes.instructionsPlaceholder:
e.g., 1) Preheat oven to 180°C...
2) Mix ingredients...
recipes.importRecipesDescription: Upload an Excel or CSV file to import multiple recipes at once. Make sure your file follows the required format.
recipes.clickToSelectOrDragDrop: Click to select a file or drag and drop
recipes.importCompleted: Import completed: {imported} of {total} recipes imported successfully.
